attributes.action: legislate the kennel club to change their criteria to a healthy dog and to stop inbreeding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The kennel club has a responsibility to ensure that the criteria for showing dogs 'is for healthy dogs' and to discourage inbreeding. King Charles spaniels and others have had their original features bred out of them at the whim of judges and breeders.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
